hypothesis_content.title: S&P Crypto Index Launch Effect on Large Caps
hypothesis_content.statement: Following the launch of S&P's new multi-asset crypto index (news item), the top 5 index constituents by weight will outperform mid-cap crypto (indexed by MVIS Crypto Mid Cap Index) by ≥4% over 5 trading days during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: S&P index inclusion drives institutional flows toward largest, most liquid crypto assets first. Mid-caps benefit later if at all. This is a structural flow hypothesis based on traditional finance adoption patterns.
entry_conditions: S&P crypto index launches (official announcement day)
Enter at next day's market open (9:30am ET)
Go long equal weight top 5 index constituents
Short/sell MVIS Crypto Mid Cap Index equivalent

exit_conditions.take_profit: Spread reaches +4% (large cap vs mid cap)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Large caps fail to outperform mid-caps by at least 2% in >60% of similar index launch events (e.g., Goldman Sachs crypto index 2023).
